subject: UEFA European Football Championship
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Andrés Iniesta, short, humble and balding at 28, has been a midfield dynamo for Spain as it prepares for Wednesday’s Euro 2012 semifinal against Portugal.
snippet: Andrés Iniesta, short, humble and balding at 28, has been a midfield dynamo for Spain as it prepares for Wednesday’s Euro 2012 semifinal against Portugal.
